title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 4 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Mar 4 2022
description:
Michael Berry, the Czar of Talk, welcomes C&B to the KTRH studios in Houston. Guest on The View calls our Constitution "trash." Will Buck ride at the rodeo? New York governor takes swipe at DeSantis, warns there will be no bullying of people who choose to wear masks. C&B remarked on the show that it's almost like DeSantis is the "third guy sitting with us" since they all agree so often. NYC Mayor Adams lifting mask, vax mandates. Caller disagrees with Clay and Buck that it "isn't our fight" in Ukraine.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Michael Berry, the Czar of Talk, welcomes C&B to the KTRH studios in Houston. Guest on The View calls our Constitution "trash." Will Buck ride at the rodeo? New York governor takes swipe at DeSantis, warns there will be no bullying of people who choose to wear masks. C&B remarked on the show that it's almost like DeSantis is the "third guy sitting with us" since they all agree so often. NYC Mayor Adams lifting mask, vax mandates. Caller disagrees with Clay and Buck that it "isn't our fight" in Ukraine.
